mutants.code:
def assign_variables(number):
    names = ['', 'Bob', 'Alice', 'Mary', 'James', 'Jennifer', 'Michael', 'Jessica', 'Jacob', 'Emma']
    name = names[number % len(names)]
    age = number
    variable_string = 'Name: {}, Age: {}'.format(name, age)
    return variable_string

    name = names[number % len(names)]
    age = number
    variable_string = 'Name: {}, Age: {}'.format(name, age)
    return variable_string

def assign_variables(number):
